about_the_game:
"Troy: The Red Winged Hero" is not so different from the first game "Troy: The Soldier", except now the ideas are more refined and much better put together.

The game has:
- An emphasis on item use, upgrades, and being smart about what you choose to do.
- A lengthy story, with enough main/optional dialogue to build a story.
- Secret bosses, optional bosses, and post game content.
- Multiple skins for the player to equip, all unique from one another.
- Loads of catchy tunes to keep the player's ears happy.
- A more refined art style that gives the player a manga feel.

And finally,
- Different weapons for each party member that allows use for different spells/skills.

Enjoy a wide array of bosses, enemies, locations, and oddities as you journey through Will playing as the brother to Michael, Liam Newguard.




Have fun and stay safe, my perfect clone.

- R

content_descriptors.notes: There are some nude (male) models, some suggestive posing, and some mature depictions all made for art purposes.

short_description: Play as Liam Newguard in a Item-Turn Based RPG game about weird things nobody asked for. Run through many locations finding new skills and spells for each of your party member's two classes. Enjoy well over 15 hours of gameplay/story in this conglomerate of inspirations I created for thee.
